ItemBlocked:
This item is blocked.
{0}d {1} until unblock.
You can use less powerfull weapon and armor.
Check command /{2} or press the block icon in the left corner
Title: WipeBlock
alreadyBlocking: This item is already in block
addedToBlocking: {0} was added to block for {1} hours
syntax:
available syntax:
 /{0} wipe - start afterwipe blocking
/{0} clear - clear the config
 /{0} remove - remove active item in hands from block
 /{0} add 5 - add active item in hands to block for 5 hours
 /{0} gendefault - generate default config
/{0} generas - generate eras config
